website_summaries.verdict: Reasonably priced and it both looks nice and generates a lot of light once you’ve got it hung. Right out of the box, however, some will find it looks a little cheap.
pros: Nice classic design at a good price
Gets high marks for ease of installation
Stem is hinged so you can hang it easily on a slanted wall
Produces a lot of well-dispersed light
cons: Some buyers felt that the quality was poor and the fixture looks cheap
The plastic diffuser in particular is a poor design, as it can get too close to the bulbs and melt

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my project
customer_reviews.text: exactly what i was looking for. added a little paint and i have a one of a kind light!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and Chic - appears grey when off and white when on
customer_reviews.text: For a basic simple fixture, this ceiling light is chic. The clean lines add to a contemporary look. It could be mounted on a slanted wall (although i did not) given the stem is hinged to accommodate that. Thankfully, it uses three standard light bulbs. A dimmer can be added as well. The size is substantial and the look is beautiful. When the light is off, the outer fabric shade appears very light grey and when the light is on it appears more white. The narrow depth of the shade makes it look much more modern. I'd use the product again and highly recommend it for any bedroom or possibly a walk-in closet to add effect.
customer_reviews.author: OutAndAbout

customer_reviews.title: Lovely fixture!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a contemporary pendant fixture for over our kitchen table and saw this. Duh, what I didn't do was notice it was short (much shorter than I needed). BUT? I ordered more extension rods from the seller, re-wired the fixture to accommodate the length and violá! It's exactly what I wanted. Great quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Imjustnutz

customer_reviews.title: Great light fixture, poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: The shade looks beautiful and goes well with my contemporary decor. I am giving it 3 stars as the stem/rod would not lock and was free. I had to buy another stem and make it work. It really is a beautiful looking light fixture but it seems that there are Quality Control and Inspection issues prior to its delivery. Hope the Manufacturer fixes it.
customer_reviews.author: Meenakshi

customer_reviews.title: Not high end - plastic not glass bezel. !
customer_reviews.text: This is a mediocre unit, the packaging is terrible and uses old polystyrene which gets everywhere. So you will have to clean the unit to get rid of all of the small polystyrene balls. I may return this item as the main round base, on full view is plastic not glass, so as you tighten the bottom nut it bends and deforms which produces a strange distorted reflection. Shame.
customer_reviews.author: Readie

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction
customer_reviews.text: Installation was relatively easy despite the rubbish instructions. Having installed lights such as this before I just assessed the parts provided and figured it out. But for someone with no experience the instructions may prove frustrating. My real disappointment is with the quality of the construction. The fabric wrap that goes around the frame is attached/glued very poorly and peeling back in a few locations. ------ Edit 9/18/20 Now even more disappointed than I was before. The bottom diffuser is made of plastic, not glass, and after 18 months of use with the 60W rated bulbs the diffuser has stained and cracked. J U N K.
customer_reviews.author: L.D

customer_reviews.title: A lot of "look' and a lot of light
customer_reviews.text: Love the design, and the texture of the lamp shade. I hung it in my bedroom, and I don't know how I ever tolerated the former fixture, as it was dull. I like the bright light this fixture provides; and I even purchased a second one and updated the bedroom light in my rental - which delighted the renters. Will be buying another one for my spare room; soft light is for lamps - when I want and need light I turn on this chandelier. Get yourself one. Or two.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Moran

customer_reviews.title: Great looking light over our dinning room table - has ...
customer_reviews.text: Great looking light over our dinning room table - has a very delicate look to it. Puts out lots of light with LED bulbs we installed.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Looks Awsome!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a drum light for my living room for a long time. All of the parts were in the box to get it installed and installation was easy. We put dimmer bulbs in it and it looks great. Even with three bulbs there is no glare on the TV and makes the living room feel cozy. I read the negative reviews, and with the company attempting to resolve issues is a huge selling point for me.
customer_reviews.author: Stan C

customer_reviews.title: great with a few key notes to notice
customer_reviews.text: For the price and quality is good. If your picky about your quality maybe go somewhere else. The bottom is plastic as stated in other reviews but honestly how many people are coming to your house and looking at the quality of your lamps. Only problem I see is if you want to install a new longer rod you have to re-do the entire wire system on the lamp. The wire system that it comes with is just long enough for this rod so be aware of that.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Montenegro

customer_reviews.title: Looks pretty in the picture, but cheap in person
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I thought it looked lovely in the photo online, but in person it looks (and feels) pretty cheap. The bottom diffuser is a shiny plastic material (ugly and chintzy-looking), and it won't sit flush in the metal tabs that hold it in, so it sits slightly crooked. It's obvious to everyone that sees it that it's not made out of quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: M. Scott

customer_reviews.title: that was annoying. But
customer_reviews.text: The polished nickle cover plate did not sit flush on the ceiling. From a cosmetic standpoint, that was annoying. But, the light, itself, is quite attractive and when I put 60W LEDs in all three light sockets, it literally turns night to day. I want bright light so I can take family photos, indoors, and for reading the paper. So, overall, I give it 4 stars. Its a very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: wuzzup

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this fixture at this price
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this fixture at this price. It looks cheaply constructed. The diffuser is made of plastic which does not sit flush at the bottom making it look crooked. I am thinking of moving this to the garage or laundry room.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: I love this ceiling light
customer_reviews.text: I love this ceiling light. I have a small condo, with a small dinning area, low ceiling, no windows. This ceiling not only makes my dinning space looks brighter, it makes the space looks clean and nice. I do need to change my dinning table set to white.
customer_reviews.author: Uyen Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this light. I had it several months before I could get it installed. It's absolutely stunning and there is not a thing about it that I don't love!
customer_reviews.author: CAROL SCHAEFFER

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have ordered the extra rods for lenght, but this is still very modern and clean. As described and a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: jbjgirl72

customer_reviews.title: Good design
customer_reviews.text: We liked it so much, we bought it twice. We live in a mid century house and it fits perfectly. They are modern yet not too contemporary and very chic. We put one by the entrance and one by the dining table. It throws enough lights with 3 light bulbs. Overall very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Stagger_Lee

customer_reviews.title: Return policy
customer_reviews.text: It's smaller in person, and the light bulb cover was cracked in 2 places. By the time I was able to have it installed and noticed the cracks after it was lite, the return window had closed. If there is a way to return it, I would consider increasing the review to 4 stars. The return policy is the reason for 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Angelynn Edwards Keane

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but cooler-cold light
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in great condition, quality appears to be nice. It still gives off a white-cold light with 40 watt warm LED dimner bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Thom

customer_reviews.title: Not as high end as I thought
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would like more expensive than it does in reality. You can see the bulbs and the electrical from underneath and ours hangs a little crooked. It's okay but I thought it would look more high end.
customer_reviews.author: Canyon Mom

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Light is stylish but have had issue with sockets the lights go in coming loose. The bulbs seem to come loose every so often. Has occured on all 3 light bulb sockets.
customer_reviews.author: Ben M.

customer_reviews.title: Interesting
customer_reviews.text: Contemporary look and design but wish the fixture had a diffuser on both top and bottom. Too much light reflects off ceiling detracts from the fixture itself and changes the look of my living room. If I turn it on I use the dimmer and set it on low.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2, loved them...buying 1 more
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these. Product arrived on time & packaged very well. One was installed at 14.5" the other at 8.5", very easy & clear instructions, simple for a novice to install. We did both in @30 minutes. The light itself is gorgeous & is exactly what I was searching for.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Malcolm

customer_reviews.title: High quality, easy installation
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these Grazia drum lights for our dining room and was so pleased with the quality of the product and ease of installation, that I got two more to install in a hallway and bedroom. The 20" diameter is perfect for all three spaces. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Harule Stokes Writing

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product at a great price. As soon as I got the first one I purchased more. Easy to install, good quality. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: It looks beautiful in our kitchen and gives off enough light with ...
customer_reviews.text: I was able, with a little bit of creative balancing, put it up myself before my husband came home. It looks beautiful in our kitchen and gives off enough light with its three bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Ticka Bates

customer_reviews.title: Chic, simple, affordable
customer_reviews.text: We replaced a ceiling fan with this fixture and BOY was that a great idea! It is a classic design and looks great lit. The room took an elegant look after we installed this light. It gave off a nice soft glow, making the space feel cozy and inviting. I'd buy this again AND recommend it to a friend :)
customer_reviews.author: CLP

customer_reviews.title: This is a great design. I bought it to use in my ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great design. I bought it to use in my kitchen and it was a little dim with 60w incandescent bulbs so I put in some LED and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: Understated elegance
customer_reviews.text: Placed 2 of these in a bedroom/ sitting area, it is an understated, elegant look. Our ceilings are 9 ft, and we are very pleased with these fixtures. This is our 2nd purchase from this company, both unique designs, easy company to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. McCaffrey

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Love the light. Got it yesterday and put it up last night. Took a little over an hour. Put it in our Kitchen. Replaced a single light against the ceiling fixture. This looks wonderful and really brightens up the room. Only drawback is the instructions. They were real general and not very clear because they were not a step by step.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Mac

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be happier with this light - it's solid and perfect for ...
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with this light - it's solid and perfect for a small-to-medium sized room. It disperses light nicely. For anyone looking for a relatively straightforward way of updating a space, I'd highly recommend going with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Reid

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged.
customer_reviews.text: After a hard install we realized the frame was bent and the light was unusable.
customer_reviews.author: AMB

customer_reviews.title: Great look
customer_reviews.text: Love the classic clean look and function of this light.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, easy to install, doesn’t hang perfectly, made a bit crooked.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: beautiful and modern
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these fixtures for a family room and liked it so much i bought another one for a bedroom. It's a real quality fixture which looks like it costs far more!
customer_reviews.author: EW17

customer_reviews.title: This is a great looking light fixture
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking light fixture. We have gotten several compliments on it and are happy not to have the standard boring light our spare room.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Girl

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the light. However, the picture makes it look more like plastic instead of fabric. The description did say it was fabric so I expected that. It is also not as white as the picture especially if you don't buy the right bulbs. I suggest "bright white" led bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Wendt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect lamp for the space. Light and airy, yet a huge amt of light. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice looking light fixture
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice looking light fixture. Not real easy to install. Hang it with a wire so you can hook it up. Well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: bfox

customer_reviews.title: I really like the way this looks in my living room
customer_reviews.text: I really like the way this looks in my living room. It is minimal, but adds that modern touch. It was also easy and straight forward to install.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony C.

customer_reviews.title: Great light fixture
customer_reviews.text: Nice, modern design, fairly easy to install. Provides a beautiful, soft light.
customer_reviews.author: Claire B

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: We really like the brightness in our eat in kitchen now the length is great the style is spot on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very nice but limited
customer_reviews.text: Looks as pictured, very nice but limited, basic installation instructions were frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Kristina K Marcus

customer_reviews.title: This light looks beautiful in our renovated kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This light looks beautiful in our renovated kitchen. We purchased soft LED 60W equivalent bulbs and it gives off a warm glow. Beautiful light fixture, the organza gives it an elevated, elegant look even in a kitchen. LOVE it, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fantastic fixture!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfull light fixture. Built with quality, and looks fantastic installed. Also appreciated the top notch packaging to ensure safe delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Mic

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, although the directions are nearly impossible to decipher.
customer_reviews.author: James Loftus

customer_reviews.title: Great fixture
customer_reviews.text: perfect for the space I had...the quality is a bit nicer than some other fixtures I ordered in a similar price range.... very nice fixture
customer_reviews.author: lisa defonce

customer_reviews.title: fits perfect on my bedroom ceiling
customer_reviews.text: it is more than I expected for the price. fits perfect on my bedroom ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Maribel Lota

customer_reviews.title: Received & Installed this light fixture - easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Received & Installed this light fixture - easy to install. Perfect size for our home office (approx. 10x13 room) Like the double drum shade & translucent fabric makes it less bulky. Was initially worried that the 3, 60 watt bulbs wouldn't be enough light but it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dorn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. Clean packaging, easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne T Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Simply beautiful. Got lots of compliments from the people who visited my house.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my room.
customer_reviews.text: This fixture is just lovely. It's modern and sleek and unusual without being garish at all. Very tasteful. It was easy to install and well packaged. It also looks quite durable.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Lush

customer_reviews.title: Good looking light pendant
customer_reviews.text: Good looking light pendant. Rod and wire was too short in my case, ordered extensions separate but they come in set of different sizes for additional $20.
customer_reviews.author: Iadviga Kourliandtchik

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item a month ago. Just opened box to mount light. Realized the plastic ring at bottom of light is scratched and damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Royce

customer_reviews.title: Great Light
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as advertised. Packaging was sound and absolutely no issues with the light. Would buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: JPC

customer_reviews.title: ... for my new house recently and I am very satisfied with my investment
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these fixtures for my new house recently and I am very satisfied with my investment. They look even better in person and give a nice contemporary look to the bedrooms. Very elegant, worth every dollar. Thank you Linea di Liara.
customer_reviews.author: Andrey Tupikov

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: In all respects operates as advertised. Workmanship reasonable and the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Solid Light!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for our angled ceiling! Seems sturdy, not sure why some reviews said it was flimsy. Lots of breaking foam for the unpacking though.
customer_reviews.author: Sheraj

customer_reviews.title: Product was delivered without shade
customer_reviews.text: The product could not be installed due to a missing lamp shade or glass. I would like my money back or a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Terrence Beepath

customer_reviews.title: Understated elegance
customer_reviews.text: This light is really pretty. Looks very high class. It was well packed, so no damage was incurred. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fixture, came and looks as expected from seeing the online photos. Looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: marco bogazzi

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, easy to install, good value
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful light fixture, and was also quite easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: RecordGeek

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this light fixture! I am very glad that it came with the option to be flush mounted to the ceiling. It looks great in our room!
customer_reviews.author: Wiley818

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Has an extension so u can hang lower.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Black

customer_reviews.title: Great Light, Will Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: Was very easy to install and looks great. LED 60watt lights are the perfect amount of light for my home office.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great light fixture.
customer_reviews.text: A great light. It was easy to install and looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Nonna

customer_reviews.title: Looks very elegant, I do believe one reviewer stated ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks very elegant , I do believe one reviewer stated it could be adjusted as advertised but that is incorrect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great product, looks amazing installed
customer_reviews.text: Great product, looks amazing installed, makes the remodel for the house we are flipping look nicer then it is. Great quality and pricing is amazing as well. Why buy Lowes light fixtures when you can have quality like this for the same price as Lowes.
customer_reviews.author: Todd S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lamp, it looks gorgeous in my living room. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: PValleF

customer_reviews.title: Lovely for a dining room
customer_reviews.text: Very elegant and a handsome addition to the dining room of our new house. Easy to install with a helper. I haven't had it very long, so I can't provide any information about it's longevity, but I'm hopeful.
customer_reviews.author: LCS TN

customer_reviews.title: This light fixture is beautiful and looks great in my bedroom
customer_reviews.text: This light fixture is beautiful and looks great in my bedroom. Very good quality and looks more expensive than it is.
customer_reviews.author: Mark M

customer_reviews.title: Elegant modern
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and looks great in room. Diffuser is glass and adds nice soft glow.
customer_reviews.author: madrelisa

customer_reviews.title: I had it installed in the master bedroom and i really like it. I've received compliments from everyone that has ...
customer_reviews.text: This light is exactly as pictured. I had it installed in the master bedroom and i really like it. I've received compliments from everyone that has seen it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The design is lovely and with the fixture near the ceiling, our we can enjoy our art without a light blocking our view.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous light - and fast shipping!! So glad I chose this piece!
customer_reviews.author: seekay39

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't get a "warm" white color out of this
customer_reviews.text: I have several Linea di Liara fixtures around my home and they're all great - however, this one renders even "warm white" bulbs into a grey/purple color because of the white diffuser and white (which actually looks silver in my opinion) shade. I tried a few different types of bulbs, even getting down around the 2200k color range, but the fixture itself renders the light into a white, almost a hint of purple color that I just don't like. Perhaps if the bottom diffuser (which is a white piece of round plastic) were more of an off-white/beige, this would solve the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great fixture looks great in the hallway as a center of attraction
customer_reviews.author: Tim151

customer_reviews.title: Repeat buyer :)
customer_reviews.text: Second purchase of Linda di Laira Grazia product. Beautiful and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful ceiling lamp
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful ceiling lamp, easy to install, product arrived on time, in one piece and well packaged. I bought this for my kitchen and it works great in the space.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful fixture that stunning in person. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: T. Michael Chesnut

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my daughters room. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Gephart

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks more pricey than it truly is. lots of compliments.

customer_reviews.text: This lamp provides good light and is very attractive. Installation was simple, and took only a few minutes.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my living room for a more simple look.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: A lovely, elegant light fixture with a retro look. Easy to install.

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and gives off good light
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and gives off good light... but the bulbs touch the plastic bottom and melts it. :/ Wish I found that out before the end of the return date. Actually wish I could contact them and have them send me a new plastic bottom. And use LED bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Frank W

customer_reviews.title: Materials are cheap feeling and while the design is nice, the execution is so-so
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is okay but I'm not nearly as thrilled about as previous reviewers were. Materials are cheap feeling and while the design is nice, the execution is so-so. The shade also has a bit of a purple-ish tinge to it when I put (warm color temp) LED or CFLs inside. Overall I just expected higher quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Flotsam

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Decent lamp but it does look a little on the cheap end.
customer_reviews.author: HRM

customer_reviews.title: keep looking
customer_reviews.text: It's very not bright, i think that the shade is too dark...am upset that I threw out the box so I can't return...looks cheap also.

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty, but I don't like the double shade
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty, but I don't like the double shade. The outside shade is yellowish and detracts from the appearance, I think. Others might like it.
customer_reviews.author: MC Brady

product_meta.title: Grazia 20 inch 3 Light Drum Chandelier Ceiling Light - Brushed Nickel - Linea di Liara LL-P117-BN
feature_bullets: Features a white fabric shade with a frosted white acrylic diffuser and brushed nickel finish
Dimensions: 20 inches (D) x 8.5 OR 14.5 inches (H), with a 6 inch removable rod included
5 1/4 inch canopy features a durable swivel to mount on vaulted or sloped ceilings. Compatible with most junction boxes
Uses (3) LED, CFL, halogen or 60W incandescent medium base bulb (E26). Bulbs sold separately
This Linea di Liara product is UL listed, and is backed by a 1 year limited manufacturer's warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars142 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
